title: My ban list right now
body:
Not necessarily in any order

Braum
Syndra
Lee Sin
Caitlyn
Kalista
Thresh
Jax
Nidalee
Yi
Katarina
Nasus
Morgana
Fizz
Cass
Gnar
Jayce
Riven
Yasuo.

Yup three bans seems good.

This guy, right here. This is pretty much the only champions I ban. Sometimes Kat if I feel like my team is going to be one of them... no CC typa teams.
i always bad fiora. ik shes bullshit and i really dont wanna put up with one in ranked
Not sure why those supports when Thresh has a get out of jail free card, a hook, a knockback, a 200% ad hit, and the box

> [{quoted}](name=Hebiki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cYjE0Ac2,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-10T06:05:26.367+0000)

> Riven
>Yup this ban seems good

ok this man knows what hes talking about

> Braum

Braum over Leo? Braum needs teammates who are AA reliant (preferably more than just 1 champion) Leona will just faceroll. I don't think either are really worth a ban (and the suckiest thing you could do is give people enough bans to start basically banning out all of the tank supports in  good spot now so that you're forced to make your toplane tank or pick a support that is outclassed by more trad/mage supports.
Leo at least is single target and CANT BODY BLOCK PROJECTILES FOR FREE.

To add, in botlane he doesn't really have a dive mechanic making him a lot less scary to all the Sorakas and Sonas out there who don't have hard CC early. Leona jumps on a Soraka and she instantly dies, Braum Qs her and she still has the chance to live.

He only body blocks the 1st projectile for free and it's a decent CD. Not to mention that Braum's CC is on a continuous stacking basis that without an ADC focusing takes forever to stack.

Braum has a great level 1 for invades but Braum has a really weak early game whereas Leona dominates early and then scales well late. Braum only becomes a monster to deal with late if you don't screw over his mana costs, lack of follow up, and lack of presence early game.

Lissandra is horrendously mana hungry and very very slow if she doesnt gain a lead.

The only thing irritating about her is the ability to be 2 places at once with her E
